complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Next.js project setup with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase integration into specific implementation steps, including configuration files, directory structure, and environment setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity as it involves multiple technologies (Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, Supabase) but follows standard setup patterns. Requires careful configuration to ensure all systems work together properly.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for Supabase Auth with JWT, including user flows for sign-up, login, password reset, and role-based access control for different user types.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to security implications, multiple user flows (signup, login, password reset), and role-based access control implementation. Authentication is a critical system component requiring thorough testing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the database schema design process for a BJJ gym management system, including entity relationships, migrations, and row-level security policies for each major data component.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to numerous interconnected entities (gyms, locations, users, memberships, billing, classes, attendance) with complex relationships. Requires careful planning for data integrity and security policies.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for gym profile and location management functionality, including CRUD operations, admin interfaces, and multi-location support features.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with standard CRUD operations but complicated by multi-location support requirements and the need for aggregated data views across locations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of a BJJ-specific membership system with tiered plans, student profiles, belt/rank progression tracking, and membership status management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple interrelated features: membership plans with different tiers, student profiles, rank progression tracking, and various membership statuses that affect billing and access.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for Stripe integration with recurring payments, including API integration, webhook handling, payment history tracking, and admin financial management interfaces.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to financial implications, third-party API integration (Stripe), webhook handling, and need for robust error handling and transaction recording. Financial systems require high reliability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of a BJJ-specific class and scheduling system, including class types, recurring schedules, calendar interface, instructor assignment, and special event handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to recurring schedule patterns, calendar visualization requirements, instructor assignments, and special event handling. Time-based operations add complexity to the implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for a multi-method attendance tracking system, including check-in processes, attendance history recording, instructor interfaces, and membership plan reconciliation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity with multiple check-in methods, real-time tracking requirements, and the need to reconcile attendance with membership plans. Requires careful UX design for efficient check-in processes.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of a comprehensive administrative dashboard for gym owners, including key metrics, member management, financial reporting, class management, and system configuration interfaces.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to the integration of multiple data sources, complex reporting requirements, and the need for an intuitive interface that presents diverse information clearly. Depends on many other components.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for a student self-service portal, including dashboard, profile management, attendance tracking, payment management, and account settings.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with standard user portal features but requires careful UX design to ensure students can easily access their information and manage their accounts without confusion.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of an instructor interface for class and student management, including dashboard, attendance taking, student roster, and special event management tools.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity focused on specific instructor needs. Requires efficient interfaces for quick attendance taking and student management during and around class times.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for an optional class reservation system, including capacity management, waitlists, cancellation policies, and notification systems.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to real-time booking constraints, capacity management, waitlist logic, and notification requirements. Needs to handle concurrent booking attempts and edge cases gracefully.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of advanced billing features, including failed payment handling, dunning management, automated reminders, discounts, and one-time payments.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to financial implications, error handling requirements, retry logic, and various payment scenarios. Requires careful testing and edge case handling to ensure financial accuracy.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for essential business reporting features, including member analysis, revenue reporting, attendance analytics, rank tracking, and filterable report generation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity due to data aggregation requirements, trend analysis, and the need for meaningful visualizations. Requires efficient database queries for potentially large datasets.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of mobile optimization for the application, including responsive design, mobile-specific components, touch interface optimization, and offline support.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity requiring responsive design principles, mobile-specific UX considerations, and offline functionality. Needs to work across various device sizes and potentially limited connectivity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for comprehensive business intelligence features, including advanced financial analytics, member lifecycle analysis, class optimization, instructor metrics, and custom report building.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity due to advanced data analysis requirements, predictive features, and custom report generation capabilities. Requires sophisticated data processing and visualization techniques.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of email communication and marketing tools, including list segmentation, templates, automated messages, announcements, and event promotion.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity with standard communication features but requires careful implementation of segmentation logic and automated messaging triggers based on system events and user actions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for external calendar synchronization, including Google and Apple Calendar integration, subscription links, event notifications, and instructor availability management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to third-party API integrations, synchronization challenges, and the need to handle updates and notifications across different calendar systems with varying capabilities.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of advanced multi-location features, including cross-location memberships, unified reporting, resource allocation tools, and location-specific configurations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to data aggregation across locations, complex business rules for cross-location memberships, and the need for comparative analytics while maintaining location-specific settings.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation steps for comprehensive system testing and performance optimization, including end-to-end testing, database and API optimization, security hardening, load testing, and client-side performance improvements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity as it touches all system components and requires specialized knowledge in testing, performance optimization, security, and scalability. Critical for system reliability and user experience.
